nodes.text: The Bulwark-class battle cruiser was a class of battlecruiser that was used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems' naval forces during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic. Sullustan Admiral Dua Ningo of the Sullustan Home Guard oversaw the construction of a flotilla of Bulwark-class battle cruisers, in which he hoped he could use to attack the Republic's capital planet of Coruscant. Ningo anticipated the flotilla's completion two years after the outbreak of the war.

Bulwark-class battle cruisers were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. They were introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity as the Bulwark Mark I in The New Essential Chronology, a 2005 reference book written by Daniel Wallace and Kevin J. Anderson.
